content: मेधा [मेध्-अञ्] (changed to मेधस् in <ab>Bah.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> when preceded by सु, दस् and the negative particle अ) {@--1@} Retentive faculty, retentiveness (of memory); धीर्धारणावती मेधा <ls>Ak.</ls> {@--2@} Intellect; intelligence in general: <ls>Bg. 10. 34</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 263</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 173.</ls> {@--3@} A form of Sarasvatī. {@--4@} A sacrifice. {@--5@} Strength, power (<ab>Ved.</ab>)
